api_list.name: Get articles from individual newspapers
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/ChinaDailyHK"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://russian-news1.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "russian-news1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Russian news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns russian news from all over the world.
api_list.code:
